comments.creator: martijn.martijn@gmail.com
comments.text:
See url, when visiting that url, I get a doorhanger notification dialog and a normal notification box displayed, that asks me:
"This website (developer.mozilla.org) is asking to store data on your computer for offline use"

I would expect a doorhanger notification or a normal notification box, but not both on the same time.

I'm seeing this occuring on trunk and on Firefox4.0.1.
comments.author: martijn.martijn@gmail.com
